thread.title: Hiten Tejwani to pair up with Toral Rasputra of Balika Vadhu fame
thread.title_full: Hiten Tejwani to pair up with Toral Rasputra of Balika Vadhu fame

title: Hiten Tejwani to pair up with Toral Rasputra of Balika Vadhu fame
text:
Hiten Tejwani to pair up with Toral Rasputra of Balika Vadhu fame February 21, 2017 UP polls: Stage collapses ahead of Akhilesh, Rahul address in Allahabad Embed Feedback 
Hiten Tejwani, who shot to fame with Kutumb's Pratham, will be seen in a play based on Bollywood film Gharwali Baharwali, opposite Toral Rasputra and Falguni Rajani. While Toral will play a housewife in the play, Falguni will play a city girl. Watch Right Now
